education.degree_name: B.Sc. in Higher Economics – Finance and organization management,
education.field_of_study: Internal & external sources of company investment, Accounting, Financial mechanisms

school.name: State Educational Institution of Secondary Vocational Education Petrovsky College
Municipal Secondary School № 242 with advanced study of Physics and Mathematics

profile_positions.description:
•	Responsible for maintaining and controlling of the quality of the processing activities within Document Processing team and Travel & Expenses team.
•	Ensure the processing of all below transactions by Document Processing team and the Travel & Expenses team within set timelines and in an accurate way:
-	Purchase Invoices
-	Travel Expenses
-	Intercompany Recharges
-	Credit Cards
-	Supplier and employee Master Data

•	Collaborate with different Omron companies (OMN and Healthcare) and departments (FDM, H&R, FC).
•	Implementation, improvement and maintenance of operational accounting processes.
•	Responsible for the centralization and integration of the operational accounting processes into the operational center in Den Bosch.
•	Assist with audits. Timely and accurate deliverance of requested data for Deloitte audit, J-SOX Controls.
•	Create process descriptions, work instructions, guidance documents, manuals and workflows to ensure continuity of all processes within the Document Team and the Travel & Expenses Team.
•	Create  and maintain monthly KPI reports, dashboard and Charts as part of the quality management system for accounting processes.
•	Coordinate  process improvements for EMEA region in cooperation with the Senior Employees of the Document Team, the Travel & Expenses Team and SPOC’s.
•	Escalations and communication with project manages, suppliers, planners, facility and purchasing.
•	Check of weekly payments( invoices, ravel expenses, salaries, Tax and etc.)
•	Assistance with Month End/Year End closings (collaboration with OMCE Financial Control team).
profile_positions.title: Accounts Payable Specialist

profile_positions.description:
My responsibilities:

-Responsible for delivering balance specifications for several accounts for month and year closing activities:
Employee related receivables
Company credit card
Advance payments suppliers
Prepaid expenses (insurances, medical and liability)
Intercompany AR and AP 
Invoice to be received
Trade payables


-Processing the total trade payables process for the Russian entity:
Checking and booking of Bills for payments and processing of VAT invoices, AoA, packing list, T12 for PO and non PO invoices.
Monitoring and reconciling  ITBR account, PIT accounts, suspense account, company card and etc.
Solving all kind of issues, developing and improving the way of working.
Periodically reconciliation of Vanderlande ERP system and Russian C1 system.
Creating and updating manual instruction for the total process in company 340
Delegation of the responsibilities to AP department and Moscow office.

-Processing of documentation for car insurances, civil liability and health insurances in JDE E1.
Processing of expense reports, temporary/ permanent advances and credit cards. 

-Processing of Intercompany invoices and additional specifications  in AR and AP for hours, provided services and Spare parts for  Russian projects.

-Processing of bank statements and booking RUB, EUR, Transit and Credit card banks.

-Solving issues due to migration of activities from Dutch to Russian entity. Finding and implementing new ways of working and reporting.

-Creating  standard Journal Entries and correction bookings on the project level.
Communication with project managers and controllers regarding  the work process.

-Creating specifications for J-Sox Key control  reports  (Voucher Logging, trade payables, ITBR accounts)
Input and providing of all necessary documentation and explanation for PWC and Internal Audit.
profile_positions.title: Senior Accountant

profile_positions.description:
My responsibilities:

-Ensuring adequate,  temporary collection and processing of financial information for internal management and external financial reporting.
-Preparation of reports, by the use of different financial systems.
-Responsible for accounting of the six companies and one Holding.
-Involved in the monthly and annual closings.
-Encode and enter purchase orders, purchase invoices and sales invoices . Resolving financial issues and questions from suppliers.
-Optimize improving procedures and processes including efficiency improvements and implementation.
-Creation of the supplier database and booking of  all the necessary data of wages , bills , bank statements and payment of taxes in SAP Business One .
-Monthly checking of payslips and paying salaries .
-Collecting and processing of financial data for preparing financial statements.
-Responsible for  VAT tax returns .
-Preparation of audit reports with some help from auditor.
-Organizing  of different Symposia and events at High Tech Campus Eindhoven:
-Intramural Innovations for Extramural Care 2014; STOP Pressure Ulcer Day 2013; New Product Decubitus Repositioning Manager; Health Innovation & Financing 2025; Brabant Business event 2013.

-All other common activities resulting from the function, as well as the observance of proprietary guidelines , work instructions and procedures .
profile_positions.title: Financial Accountant

profile_positions.description:
My responsibilities:

-Managing HR department and Financial Accountant: financial plans, financial reports, contracts, financial control, official registration of necessary administration papers, documents and reports, recruiting of new employees, responsible for the selection of candidates and introduction of newly recruited staff.
-Conduct interviews and psychological training.
-Change mgmt responsibility: changing HR software system (1C to "Boss clerk human resources department").
profile_positions.title: Department Manager / Financial Manager - Human Resources Department

profile_positions.description:
My responsibilities:

-Managing several teams within the company. Support the managers in taking various strategic decisions.
-Inspector - Human Resources Department: managing HR (HR admin, document admin, office admin, audit admin),
-Negotiator with suppliers and customers, assistance to CEO.
-Financial plans and reports, control of execution and due quality of preparation of documents. Business correspondence. Formation and legal processing of business files.
profile_positions.title: Department Manager/ Financial Accountant

profile_positions.description:
My responsibilities:

-Supporting manager with daily work and urgent tasks
-Customer service.
-Developing and improvement of the working process 
-Updating clients dossiers and assisting to the management team.
profile_positions.title: Assistant to department manager

profile_positions.description:
My responsibilities:

-Financial administration and accountancy, customer relationship management
-ICT mgmt (coordination databases and reservation system Amadeus, Galileo and Sabre), Negotiator with suppliers.
-Filling client files and creating financial statements for different departments.
profile_positions.title: Assistant to CEO
